content:
#21582 is an IsAdicCompleteAPI development. Although it has 450 lines, almost all of them are devoted to establishing variants of the IsPrecomplete.precwith easier conditions to check.

This also blocks the definition of Fontaine's theta map #21564, so it would be nice to have it reviewed and merged soon.
Thanks for the PR, I will have a look in the next few days if nobody does it.
(feel free to ping me if I forget)
@Jiang Jiedong how far are we from B_{dR}? I thought that Maria Ines told me that we were only missing one thing -- is this that thing?
Yes! I think this (Fontaine’s theta map) is the only missing thing. I plan to define B_dR in #21564 together with Fontaine’s theta map.
